Scanner - Class in robot
Scanner class which implements logic for scanning lights and obstacles Adapted from ScanRecorder.java in the skeleton

Constructor for Scanner class that takes in the motor and lightsensor as params

Scanner0 - Class in experimental
software abstraction of a light sensor rotating in a horizontal plane, driven by a motor Records the light value and bearing of the brightest light seen during a scan.
Scanner0(NXTRegulatedMotor, LightSensor) - Constructor for class experimental.Scanner0
 
scanObject(int) - Method in class robot.Scanner
 
ScanRecorder - Class in experimental
records the results of a 180 degree scan (angle and light intensity to a dataLogger and plays it back over a USB port

scanTo(int) - Method in class experimental.ScanRecorder
